data.oai_dc:dc: The dataset gathers collection records (68 records from 9 countries) of Phytoseiulus persimilis Athias-Henriot (Acari: Phytoseiidae) along with support plant records. The dataset was used for the distribution modelling of the predator-prey system Phytoseiulus persimilis Athias-Henriot (Acari: Phytoseiidae) and Tetranychus urticae (Koch) (Acari: Tetranychidae) which represents the most studied and the most known system among the Acari.|65 occurrences
